strapiPost.title: Springdale Startup Earns $2m In Late Stage Seed Round
strapiPost.content:
A local startup has raised $2m in a late-stage seed round. 

  • Around town: Springdale-based EasyBins is a one-of-a-kind grocery delivery service. Customers can order items from multiple stores around town and have them delivered in a temperature-controlled bin.
  • Footprint: Easy bins is currently in 6 locations around the state. The funding from this late-stage seed round will go toward the continued expansion of the companyâ€™s geographic footprint along with technology and staff.

Read the full Talk Business & Politics story HERE.
